wikipedia_page.main: Mervyn Bennett (20 February 1960 – 1998) was a professional lightweight boxer from Wales. Born in Cardiff, Bennett was notable for becoming the Welsh lightweight champion in 1993. He successfully defended his title on one occasion before retiring from the sport in 1996.

response: Mervyn Bennett (born 7 September 1944) is an Australian equestrian. He won a bronze medal in team eventing at the 1976 Summer Olympics in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.
